text:
Running the example ﬁrst summarizes the shape of the loaded dataset. The dataset has
three years, or 36 observations. We will use the ﬁrst 24 for training and the remaining 12 as the
test set.
(36, 1)
Listing 11.36: Example output from loading and summarizing the shape of the monthly shampoo
sales dataset
A line plot of the series is also created. We can see that there is an obvious trend and no
obvious seasonality.
